scripts.update-seo: npm run generate-sitemap && echo 'SEO files updated! Remember to submit sitemap to Google Search Console.'

usage: Run 'node public/sitemap-generator.js' to generate sitemap.xml and sitemap.json
After deploying new pages, always run the sitemap generator
Submit the new sitemap to Google Search Console at https://search.google.com/search-console
The crawler frequency is set to weekly as requested
deployment-checklist: 4. Submit sitemap URL to Google Search Console
5. Set up weekly recrawl if needed
